Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Requires the commissioner of economic development to conduct a study of the economic impact of ATV use within the state
Summary: Requires the commissioner of economic development to conduct a study of the economic impact of ATV use within the state.
ActClause: AN ACT requiring the commissioner of economic development to conduct a study on the economic impact of all terrain vehicle usage in this state
